channel.title: Running VPNs behind squid
channel.description: after i read about "_https://0x00sec.org/t/create-your-own-private-botnet-with-proxydock/5917/2_" I'm wondering its possible to running rotate VPNs behind squid ? or connect proxycains behind squid. So we only input one IP adresses to using rotate VPNs.
